English: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description

d.f: `一~`種~`國畫~`繪畫~`方式~。`用~`筆~`工巧~`細密~，`著重~`細部~`的~`描繪~。

English: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
